sp.p: ou)kou=n o(/sw| mei/zous tw=n ou)sw=n e(ka/terai kai\ e)la/ttous fai/nontai, tou=to a)potemo/menos e(kate/rwn to\ faino/menon a)ll' ou)k o)/n, ou)/te au)to\ o)rqw=s faino/menon e)rei=s, ou)d' au)= pote to\ e)pi\ tou/tw| me/ros th=s h(donh=s kai\ lu/phs gigno/menon o)rqo/n te kai\ a)lhqe\s tolmh/seis le/gein.

sp.speaker: *prw/tarxos
sp.p: ou) ga\r ou)=n.

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p: tou/twn toi/nun e(ch=s o)yo/meqa e)a\n th=|de a)pantw=men h(dona\s kai\ lu/pas yeudei=s e)/ti ma=llon h)\ tau/tas fainome/nas te kai\ ou)/sas e)n toi=s zw/|ois.

sp.speaker: *prw/tarxos
sp.p: poi/as dh\ kai\ pw=s le/geis;

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p: ei)/rhtai/ pou polla/kis o(/ti th=s fu/sews e(ka/stwn diafqeirome/nhs me\n sugkri/sesi kai\ diakri/sesi kai\ plhrw/sesi kai\ kenw/sesi kai/ tisin au)/cais kai\ fqi/sesi lu=pai/ te kai\ a)lghdo/nes kai\ o)du/nai kai\ pa/nq' o(po/sa toiau=t' o)no/mata e)/xei sumbai/nei gigno/mena.

sp.speaker: *prw/tarxos
sp.p: nai/, tau=ta ei)/rhtai polla/kis.

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p:
ei)s de/ ge th
 au(tw=n fu/sin o(/tan kaqisth=tai, tau/thn au)= th
 kata/stasin h(donh
 a)pedeca/meqa par' h(mw=n au)tw=n.

sp.speaker: *prw/tarxos
sp.p: o)rqw=s.

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p: ti/ d' o(/tan peri\ to\ sw=ma mhde\n tou/twn gigno/menon h(mw=n h)=|;

sp.speaker: *prw/tarxos
sp.p: po/te de\ tou=t' a)\n ge/noito, w)= *sw/krates;

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p: ou)de\n pro\s lo/gon e)sti/n, w)= *prw/tarxe, o(\ su\ nu=n h)/rou to\ e)rw/thma.

sp.speaker: *prw/tarxos
sp.p: ti/ dh/;

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p: dio/ti th\n e)mh\n e)rw/thsin ou) kwlu/eis me diere/sqai se pa/lin.

sp.speaker: *prw/tarxos
sp.p: poi/an;

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p: ei) d' ou)=n mh\ gi/gnoito, w)= *prw/tarxe, fh/sw, to\ toiou=ton, ti/ pote a)nagkai=on e)c au)tou= sumbai/nein h(mi=n;

sp.speaker: *prw/tarxos
sp.p: mh\ kinoume/nou tou= sw/matos e)f' e(ka/tera fh/|s;

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p: ou(/tws.

sp.speaker: *prw/tarxos
sp.p: dh=lon dh\ tou=to/ ge, w)= *sw/krates, w(s ou)/te h(donh\ gi/gnoit' a)\n e)n tw=| toiou/tw| pote\ ou)/t' a)/n tis lu/ph.

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p: ka/llist' ei)=pes. a)lla\ ga\r oi)=mai to/de le/geis, w(s a)ei/ ti tou/twn a)nagkai=on h(mi=n sumbai/nein, w(s oi( sofoi/ fasin: a)ei\ ga\r a(/panta a)/nw te kai\ ka/tw r(ei=.

sp.speaker: *prw/tarxos
sp.p: le/gousi ga\r ou)=n, kai\ dokou=si/ ge ou) fau/lws le/gein.

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p: pw=s ga\r a)/n, mh\ fau=loi/ ge o)/ntes; a)lla\ ga\r u(peksth=nai to\n lo/gon e)pifero/menon tou=ton bou/lomai. th=|d' ou)=n dianoou=mai feu/gein, kai\ su/ moi su/mfeuge.

sp.speaker: *prw/tarxos
sp.p: le/ge o(/ph|.

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p: tau=ta me\n toi/nun ou(/tws e)/stw, fw=men pro\s tou/tous: su\ d' a)po/krinai po/teron a)ei\ pa/nta, o(po/sa pa/sxei ti tw=n e)myu/xwn, tau=t' ai)sqa/netai to\ pa/sxon, kai\ ou)/t' au)cano/menoi lanqa/nomen h(ma=s au)tou\s ou)/te ti tw=n toiou/twn ou)de\n pa/sxontes, h)\ pa=n tou)nanti/on.

sp.speaker: *prw/tarxos
sp.p: a(/pan dh/pou tou)nanti/on: o)li/gou ga\r ta/ ge toiau=ta le/lhqe pa/nq' h(ma=s.

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p: ou) toi/nun kalw=s h(mi=n ei)/rhtai to\ nundh\ r(hqe/n, w(s ai( metabolai\ ka/tw te kai\ a)/nw gigno/menai lu/pas te kai\ h(dona\s a)perga/zontai.

sp.speaker: *prw/tarxos
sp.p: ti/ mh/n;

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p: w(=d' e)/stai ka/llion kai\ a)nepilhpto/teron to\ lego/menon.

sp.speaker: *prw/tarxos
sp.p: pw=s;

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p: w(s ai( me\n mega/lai metabolai\ lu/pas te kai\ h(dona\s poiou=sin h(mi=n, ai( d' au)= me/triai/ te kai\ smikrai\ to\ para/pan ou)de/tera tou/twn.

sp.speaker: *prw/tarxos
sp.p: o)rqo/teron ou(/tws h)\ 'kei/nws, w)= *sw/krates.

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p: ou)kou=n ei) tau=ta ou(/tw, pa/lin o( nundh\ r(hqei\s bi/os a)\n h(/koi.

sp.speaker: *prw/tarxos
sp.p: poi=os;

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p: o(\n a)/lupo/n te kai\ a)/neu xarmonw=n e)/famen ei)=nai.

sp.speaker: *prw/tarxos
sp.p: a)lhqe/stata le/geis.

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p:
e)k dh\ tou/twn tiqw=men trittou\s h(mi=n bi/ous, e(/na me
 h(du/n, to
 d' au)= luphro/n, to
 d' e(/na mhde/tera. h)\ pw=s a)
 fai/hs su\ peri\ tou/twn;

sp.speaker: *prw/tarxos
sp.p: ou)k a)/llws e)/gwge h)\ tau/th|, trei=s ei)=nai tou\s bi/ous.

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p: ou)kou=n ou)k a)\n ei)/h to\ mh\ lupei=sqai/ pote tau)to\n tw=| xai/rein;

sp.speaker: *prw/tarxos
sp.p: pw=s ga\r a)/n;

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p:
o(po/tan ou)=n a)kou/sh|s w(s h(/diston pa/ntwn e)sti
 a)lu/pws diatelei=n to
 bi/on a(/panta, ti/ to/q' u(polamba/neis le/gein to
 toiou=ton;

sp.speaker: *prw/tarxos
sp.p: h(du\ le/gein fai/netai e)/moige ou(=tos to\ mh\ lupei=sqai.

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p: triw=n o)/ntwn ou)=n h(mi=n, w(=ntinwn bou/lei, ti/qei, kalli/osin i(/na o)no/masi xrw/meqa, to\ me\n xruso/n, to\ d' a)/rguron, tri/ton de\ to\ mhde/tera tou/twn.

sp.speaker: *prw/tarxos
sp.p: kei=tai.

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p: to\ dh\ mhde/tera tou/twn e)/sq' h(mi=n o(/pws qa/tera ge/noito a)/n, xruso\s h)\ a)/rguros;

sp.speaker: *prw/tarxos
sp.p: kai\ pw=s a)/n;

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p: ou)d' a)/ra o( me/sos bi/os h(du\s h)\ luphro\s lego/menos o)rqw=s a)/n pote ou)/t' ei) doca/zoi tis, doca/zoito, ou)/t' ei) le/goi, lexqei/h, kata/ ge to\n o)rqo\n lo/gon.

sp.speaker: *prw/tarxos
sp.p: pw=s ga\r a)/n;

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p: a)lla\ mh/n, w)= e(tai=re, lego/ntwn ge tau=ta kai\ docazo/ntwn ai)sqano/meqa.

sp.speaker: *prw/tarxos
sp.p: kai\ ma/la.

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p: po/teron ou)=n kai\ xai/rein oi)/ontai to/te o(/tan mh\ lupw=ntai;

sp.speaker: *prw/tarxos
sp.p: fasi\ gou=n.

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p: ou)kou=n oi)/ontai to/te xai/rein: ou) ga\r a)\n e)/lego/n pou.

sp.speaker: *prw/tarxos
sp.p: kinduneu/ei.

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p: yeudh= ge mh\n doca/zousi peri\ tou= xai/rein, ei)/per xwri\s tou= mh\ lupei=sqai kai\ tou= xai/rein h( fu/sis e(kate/rou.

sp.speaker: *prw/tarxos
sp.p: kai\ mh\n xwri/s ge h)=n.

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p:
po/teron ou)=n ai(rw/meqa par' h(mi=n tau=t' ei)=nai, kaqa/per a)/rti, tri/a, h)\ du/o mo/na, lu/phn me
 kako
 toi=s a)nqrw/pois, th
 d' a)pallagh
 tw=n lupw=n, au)to\ tou=to a)gaqo
 o)/n, h(du\ prosagoreu/esqai;

sp.speaker: *prw/tarxos
sp.p: pw=s dh\ nu=n tou=to, w)= *sw/krates, e)rwtw/meqa u(f' h(mw=n au)tw=n; ou) ga\r manqa/nw.

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p: o)/ntws ga\r tou\s polemi/ous *filh/bou tou=de, w)= *prw/tarxe, ou) manqa/neis;

sp.speaker: *prw/tarxos
sp.p: le/geis de\ au)tou\s ti/nas;

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p: kai\ ma/la deinou\s legome/nous ta\ peri\ fu/sin, oi(\ to\ para/pan h(dona\s ou)/ fasin ei)=nai.

sp.speaker: *prw/tarxos
sp.p: ti/ mh/n;

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p: lupw=n tau/tas ei)=nai pa/sas a)pofuga/s, a(\s nu=n oi( peri\ *fi/lhbon h(dona\s e)ponoma/zousin.

sp.speaker: *prw/tarxos
sp.p: tou/tois ou)=n h(ma=s po/tera pei/qesqai sumbouleu/eis, h)\ pw=s, w)= *sw/krates;

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p:
ou)/k, a)ll' w(/sper ma/ntesi prosxrh=sqai/ tisi, manteuome/nois ou) te/xnh| a)lla/ tini dusxerei/a| fu/sews ou)k a)gennou=s li/an memishko/twn th
 th=s h(donh=s du/namin kai\ nenomiko/twn ou)de
 u(gie/s, w(/ste kai\ au)to\ tou=to au)th=s to\ e)pagwgo
 goh/teuma, ou)x h(donh/n, ei)=nai. tou/tois me
 ou)=n tau=ta a)
 prosxrh/saio, skeya/menos e)/ti kai\ ta\ a)/lla au)tw=n dusxera/smata: meta\ de\ tau=ta ai(/ ge/ moi dokou=sin h(donai\ a)lhqei=s ei)=nai peu/sh|, i(/na e)c a)mfoi=n toi=n lo/goin skeya/menoi th
 du/namin au)th=s paraqw/meqa pro\s th
 kri/sin.

sp.speaker: *prw/tarxos
sp.p: o)rqw=s le/geis.

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p:
metadiw/kwmen dh\ tou/tous, w(/sper summa/xous, kata\ to\ th=s dusxerei/as au)tw=n i)/xnos. oi)=mai ga toio/nde ti le/gein au)tou/s, a)rxome/nous poqe
 a)/nwqen, w(s ei) boulhqei=men o(touou=n ei)/dous th
 fu/sin i)dei=n, oi(=on th
 tou= sklhrou=, po/teron ei)s ta\ sklhro/tata a)poble/pontes ou(/tws a)
 ma=llon sunnoh/saimen h)\ pro\s ta\ pollosta\ sklhro/thti; dei= dh/ se, w)= *prw/tarxe, kaqa/per e)moi/, kai\ tou/tois toi=s dusxere/sin a)pokri/nesqai.

sp.speaker: *prw/tarxos
sp.p: pa/nu me\n ou)=n, kai\ le/gw ge au)toi=s o(/ti pro\s ta\ prw=ta mege/qei.

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p: ou)kou=n ei) kai\ to\ th=s h(donh=s ge/nos i)dei=n h(/ntina/ pot' e)/xei fu/sin boulhqei=men, ou)k ei)s ta\s pollosta\s h(dona\s a)poblepte/on, a)ll' ei)s ta\s a)krota/tas kai\ sfodrota/tas legome/nas.

sp.speaker: *prw/tarxos
sp.p: pa=s a)/n soi tau/th| sugxwroi/h ta\ nu=n.

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p: a)=r' ou)=n, ai( pro/xeiroi/ ge ai(/per kai\ me/gistai tw=n h(donw=n, o(\ le/gomen polla/kis, ai( peri\ to\ sw=ma/ ei)sin au(=tai;

sp.speaker: *prw/tarxos
sp.p: pw=s ga\r ou)/;

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p: po/teron ou)=n kai\ mei/zous ei)si\ kai\ gi/gnontai peri\ tou\s ka/mnontas e)n tai=s no/sois h)\ peri\ u(giai/nontas; eu)labhqw=men de\ mh\ propetw=s a)pokrino/menoi ptai/swme/n ph|. ta/xa ga\r i)/sws fai=men a)\n peri\ u(giai/nontas.

sp.speaker: *prw/tarxos
sp.p: ei)ko/s ge.

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p: ti/ d'; ou)x au(=tai tw=n h(donw=n u(perba/llousin, w(=n a)\n kai\ e)piqumi/ai me/gistai progi/gnwntai;

sp.speaker: *prw/tarxos
sp.p: tou=to me\n a)lhqe/s.

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p: a)ll' ou)x oi( pure/ttontes kai\ e)n toiou/tois nosh/masin e)xo/menoi ma=llon diyw=si kai\ r(igou=si kai\ pa/nta o(po/sa dia\ tou= sw/matos ei)w/qasi pa/sxein, ma=llo/n t' e)ndei/a| suggi/gnontai kai\ a)poplhroume/nwn mei/zous h(dona\s i)/sxousin; h)\ tou=to ou) fh/somen a)lhqe\s ei)=nai;

sp.speaker: *prw/tarxos
sp.p: pa/nu me\n ou)=n nu=n r(hqe\n fai/netai.

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p: ti/ ou)=n; o)rqw=s a)\n fainoi/meqa le/gontes w(s ei)/ tis ta\s megi/stas h(dona\s i)dei=n bou/loito, ou)k ei)s u(gi/eian a)ll' ei)s no/son i)o/ntas dei= skopei=n; o(/ra de\ mh/ me h(gh=| dianoou/menon e)rwta=n se ei) plei/w xai/rousin oi( sfo/dra nosou=ntes tw=n u(giaino/ntwn, a)ll' oi)/ou me/geqo/s me zhtei=n h(donh=s, kai\ to\ sfo/dra peri\ tou= toiou/tou pou= pote gi/gnetai e(ka/stote. noh=sai ga\r dei= famen h(/ntina fu/sin e)/xei kai\ ti/na le/gousin oi( fa/skontes mhd' ei)=nai to\ para/pan au)th/n.

sp.speaker: *prw/tarxos
sp.p: a)lla\ sxedo\n e(/pomai tw=| lo/gw| sou.

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p: ta/xa, w)= *prw/tarxe, ou)x h(=tton dei/ceis. a)po/krinai ga/r: e)n u(/brei mei/zous h(dona/s—ou) plei/ous le/gw, tw=| sfo/dra de\ kai\ tw=| ma=llon u(perexou/sas—o(ra=|s h)\ e)n tw=| sw/froni bi/w|; le/ge de\ prose/xwn to\n nou=n.

sp.speaker: *prw/tarxos
sp.p: a)ll' e)/maqon o(\ le/geis, kai\ polu\ to\ diafe/ron o(rw=. tou\s me\n ga\r sw/frona/s pou kai\ o( paroimiazo/menos e)pi/sxei lo/gos e(ka/stote, o( to\ “mhde\n a)/gan” parakeleuo/menos, w(=| pei/qontai: to\ de\ tw=n a)fro/nwn te kai\ u(bristw=n me/xri mani/as h( sfodra\ h(donh\ kate/xousa periboh/tous a)perga/zetai.

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p: kalw=s: kai\ ei)/ ge tou=q' ou(/tws e)/xei, dh=lon w(s e)/n tini ponhri/a| yuxh=s kai\ tou= sw/matos, a)ll' ou)k e)n a)reth=| me/gistai me\n h(donai/, me/gistai de\ kai\ lu=pai gi/gnontai.

sp.speaker: *prw/tarxos
sp.p: pa/nu me\n ou)=n.

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p: ou)kou=n tou/twn tina\s proelo/menon dei= skopei=sqai ti/na pote\ tro/pon e)xou/sas e)le/gomen au)ta\s ei)=nai megi/stas.

sp.speaker: *prw/tarxos
sp.p: a)na/gkh.

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p: sko/pei dh\ ta\s tw=n toiw=nde noshma/twn h(dona/s, ti/na pote\ e)/xousi tro/pon.

sp.speaker: *prw/tarxos
sp.p: poi/wn;

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p: ta\s tw=n a)sxhmo/nwn, a(\s ou(\s ei)/pomen dusxerei=s misou=si pantelw=s.

sp.speaker: *prw/tarxos
sp.p: poi/as;

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p: oi(=on ta\s th=s yw/ras i)a/seis tw=| tri/bein kai\ o(/sa toiau=ta, ou)k a)/llhs deo/mena farma/cews: tou=to ga\r dh\ to\ pa/qos h(mi=n, w)= pro\s qew=n, ti/ pote fw=men e)ggi/gnesqai; po/teron h(donh\n h)\ lu/phn;

sp.speaker: *prw/tarxos
sp.p: su/mmeikton tou=to/ g' a)/r', w)= *sw/krates, e)/oike gi/gnesqai/ ti kako/n.

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p:
ou) me
 dh\ *filh/bou ge e(/neka pareqe/mhn to
 lo/gon: a)ll' a)/neu tou/twn, w)= *prw/tarxe, tw=n h(donw=n kai\ tw=n tau/tais e(pome/nwn, a)
 mh\ katofqw=si, sxedo
 ou)k a)/n pote dunai/meqa diakri/nasqai to\ nu=n zhtou/menon.

sp.speaker: *prw/tarxos
sp.p: ou)kou=n i)te/on e)pi\ ta\s tou/twn suggenei=s.

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p: ta\s e)n th=| mei/cei koinwnou/sas le/geis;

sp.speaker: *prw/tarxos
sp.p: pa/nu me\n ou)=n.

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p: ei)si\ toi/nun mei/ceis ai( me\n kata\ to\ sw=ma e)n au)toi=s toi=s sw/masin, ai( d' au)th=s th=s yuxh=s e)n th=| yuxh=|: ta\s d' au)= th=s yuxh=s kai\ tou= sw/matos a)neurh/somen lu/pas h(donai=s meixqei/sas tote\ me\n h(dona\s ta\ sunamfo/tera, tote\ de\ lu/pas e)pikaloume/nas.

sp.speaker: *prw/tarxos
sp.p: pw=s;

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p: o(po/tan e)n th=| katasta/sei tis h)\ th=| diafqora=| ta)nanti/a a(/ma pa/qh pa/sxh|, pote\ r(igw=n qe/rhtai kai\ qermaino/menos e)ni/ote yu/xhtai, zhtw=n oi)=mai to\ me\n e)/xein, tou= de\ a)palla/ttesqai, to\ dh\ lego/menon pikrw=| gluku\ memeigme/non, meta\ dusapallakti/as paro/n, a)gana/kthsin kai\ u(/steron su/ntasin a)gri/an poiei=.

sp.speaker: *prw/tarxos
sp.p: kai\ ma/la a)lhqe\s to\ nu=n lego/menon.

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p: ou)kou=n ai( toiau=tai mei/ceis ai( me\n e)c i)/swn ei)si\ lupw=n te kai\ h(donw=n, ai( d' e)k tw=n e(te/rwn pleio/nwn;

sp.speaker: *prw/tarxos
sp.p: pw=s ga\r ou)/;

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p: le/ge dh\ ta\s me/n, o(/tan plei/ous lu=pai tw=n h(donw=n gi/gnwntai—ta\s th=s yw/ras legome/nas nundh\ tau/tas ei)=nai kai\ ta\s tw=n gargalismw=n—o(po/tan <e)n toi=s> e)nto\s to\ ze/on h)=| kai\ to\ flegmai=non, th=| tri/yei de\ kai\ th=| knh/sei mh\ e)fiknh=tai/ tis, to\ d' e)pipolh=s mo/non diaxe/h|, tote\ fe/rontes ei)s pu=r au)ta\ kai\ ei)s tou)nanti/on puri/ais metaba/llontes e)ni/ote a)mhxa/nous h(dona/s, tote\ de\ tou)nanti/on toi=s e)nto\s pro\s ta\ tw=n e)/cw, lu/pas h(donai=s sugkerasqei/sas, ei)s o(po/ter' a)\n r(e/yh|, pare/sxonto tw=| ta\ sugkekrime/na bi/a| diaxei=n h)\ ta\ diakekrime/na sugxei=n —[kai\] o(mou= lu/pas h(donai=s paratiqe/nai.

sp.speaker: *prw/tarxos

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p: “ou)/toi a)po/blhton e)/pos” ei)=nai dei=, w)= *fai=dre, o(\ a)\n ei)/pwsi sofoi/, a)lla\ skopei=n mh/ ti le/gwsi: kai\ dh\ kai\ to\ nu=n lexqe\n ou)k a)fete/on.

sp.speaker: *fai=dros
sp.p: o)rqw=s le/geis.

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p: w(=de dh\ skopw=men au)to/.

sp.speaker: *fai=dros
sp.p: pw=s;

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p: ei)/ se pei/qoimi e)gw\ polemi/ous a)mu/nein kthsa/menon i(/ppon, a)/mfw de\ i(/ppon a)gnooi=men, toso/nde me/ntoi tugxa/noimi ei)dw\s peri\ sou=, o(/ti *fai=dros i(/ppon h(gei=tai to\ tw=n h(me/rwn zw/|wn me/gista e)/xon w)=ta—

sp.speaker: *fai=dros
sp.p: geloi=o/n g' a)/n, w)= *sw/krates, ei)/h.

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p: ou)/pw ge: a)ll' o(/te dh\ spoudh=| se pei/qoimi, suntiqei\s lo/gon e)/painon kata\ tou= o)/nou, i(/ppon e)ponoma/zwn kai\ le/gwn w(s panto\s a)/cion to\ qre/mma oi)/koi te kekth=sqai kai\ e)pi\ stratia=s, a)popolemei=n te xrh/simon kai\ pro/s g' e)negkei=n dunato\n skeu/h kai\ a)/lla polla\ w)fe/limon.

sp.speaker: *fai=dros
sp.p: pagge/loio/n g' a)\n h)/dh ei)/h.

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p: a)=r' ou)=n ou) krei=tton geloi=on kai\ fi/lon h)\ deino/n te kai\ e)xqro\n [ei)=nai h)\ fi/lon];

sp.speaker: *fai=dros
sp.p: fai/netai.

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p:
o(/tan ou)=n o( r(htoriko\s a)gnow=n a)gaqo
 kai\ kako/n, labw
 po/lin w(sau/tws e)/xousan pei/qh|, mh\ peri\ o)/nou skia=s w(s i(/ppou to
 e)/painon poiou/menos, a)lla\ peri\ kakou= w(s a)gaqou=, do/cas de\ plh/qous memelethkw\s pei/sh| kaka\ pra/ttein a)nt' a)gaqw=n, poi=o/n tin' a)\<n> oi)/ei meta\ tau=ta th
 r(htorikh
 karpo
 w(=n e)/speire qeri/zein;

sp.speaker: *fai=dros
sp.p: ou) pa/nu ge e)pieikh=.

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p: a)=r' ou)=n, w)= a)gaqe/, a)groiko/teron tou= de/ontos leloidorh/kamen th\n tw=n lo/gwn te/xnhn; h( d' i)/sws a)\n ei)/poi: “ti/ pot', w)= qauma/sioi, lhrei=te; e)gw\ ga\r ou)de/n' a)gnoou=nta ta)lhqe\s a)nagka/zw manqa/nein le/gein, a)ll', ei)/ ti e)mh\ sumboulh/, kthsa/menon e)kei=no ou(/tws e)me\ lamba/nein: to/de d' ou)=n me/ga le/gw, w(s a)/neu e)mou= tw=| ta\ o)/nta ei)do/ti ou)de/n ti ma=llon e)/stai pei/qein te/xnh|.”

sp.speaker: *fai=dros
sp.p: ou)kou=n di/kaia e)rei=, le/gousa tau=ta;

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p: fhmi/, e)a\n oi(/ g' e)pio/ntes au)th=| lo/goi marturw=sin ei)=nai te/xnh|. w(/sper ga\r a)kou/ein dokw= tinwn prosio/ntwn kai\ diamarturome/nwn lo/gwn, o(/ti yeu/detai kai\ ou)k e)/sti te/xnh a)ll' a)/texnos tribh/: tou= de\ le/gein, fhsi\n o( *la/kwn, e)/tumos te/xnh a)/neu tou= a)lhqei/as h(=fqai ou)/t' e)/stin ou)/te mh/ pote u(/steron ge/nhtai.

sp.speaker: *fai=dros
sp.p: tou/twn dei= tw=n lo/gwn, w)= *sw/krates: a)lla\ deu=ro au)tou\s para/gwn e)ce/taze ti/ kai\ pw=s le/gousin.

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p: pa/rite dh/, qre/mmata gennai=a, kalli/paida/ te *fai=dron pei/qete w(s e)a\n mh\ i(kanw=s filosofh/sh|, ou)de\ i(kano/s pote le/gein e)/stai peri\ ou)deno/s. a)pokrine/sqw dh\ o( *fai=dros.

sp.speaker: *fai=dros
sp.p: e)rwta=te.

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p:
a)=r' ou)=n ou) to\ me
 o(/lon h( r(htorikh\ a)
 ei)/h te/xnh yuxagwgi/a tis dia\ lo/gwn, ou) mo/non e)n dikasthri/ois kai\ o(/soi a)/lloi dhmo/sioi su/llogoi, a)lla\ kai\ e)n i)di/ois, h( au)th\ smikrw=n te kai\ mega/lwn pe/ri, kai\ ou)de
 e)ntimo/teron to/ ge o)rqo
 peri\ spoudai=a h)\ peri\ fau=la gigno/menon; h)\ pw=s su\ tau=t' a)kh/koas;

sp.speaker: *fai=dros
sp.p: ou) ma\ to\n *di/' ou) panta/pasin ou(/tws, a)lla\ ma/lista me/n pws peri\ ta\s di/kas le/getai/ te kai\ gra/fetai te/xnh|, le/getai de\ kai\ peri\ dhmhgori/as: e)pi\ ple/on de\ ou)k a)kh/koa.

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p: a)ll' h)= ta\s *ne/storos kai\ *)odusse/ws te/xnas mo/non peri\ lo/gwn a)kh/koas, a(\s e)n *)ili/w| sxola/zontes sunegraya/thn, tw=n de\ *palamh/dous a)nh/koos ge/gonas;

sp.speaker: *fai=dros
sp.p: kai\ nai\ ma\ *di/' e)/gwge tw=n *ne/storos, ei) mh\ *gorgi/an *ne/stora/ tina kataskeua/zeis, h)/ tina *qrasu/maxo/n te kai\ *qeo/dwron *)odusse/a.

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p: i)/sws. a)lla\ ga\r tou/tous e)w=men: su\ d' ei)pe/, e)n dikasthri/ois oi( a)nti/dikoi ti/ drw=sin; ou)k a)ntile/gousin me/ntoi; h)\ ti/ fh/somen;

sp.speaker: *fai=dros
sp.p: tou=t' au)to/.

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p: peri\ tou= dikai/ou te kai\ a)di/kou;

sp.speaker: *fai=dros
sp.p: nai/.

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p: ou)kou=n o( te/xnh| tou=to drw=n poih/sei fanh=nai to\ au)to\ toi=s au)toi=s tote\ me\n di/kaion, o(/tan de\ bou/lhtai, a)/dikon;

sp.speaker: *fai=dros
sp.p: ti/ mh/n;

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p: kai\ e)n dhmhgori/a| dh\ th=| po/lei dokei=n ta\ au)ta\ tote\ me\n a)gaqa/, tote\ d' au)= ta)nanti/a;

sp.speaker: *fai=dros
sp.p: ou(/tws.

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p:
to
 ou)=n *)eleatiko
 *palamh/dhn le/gonta ou)k i)/smen te/xnh|, w(/ste fai/nesqai toi=s a)kou/ousi ta\ au)ta\ o(/moia kai\ a)no/moia, kai\ e(
 kai\ polla/, me/nonta/ te au)= kai\ fero/mena;

sp.speaker: *fai=dros
sp.p: ma/la ge.

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p: ou)k a)/ra mo/non peri\ dikasth/ria/ te/ e)stin h( a)ntilogikh\ kai\ peri\ dhmhgori/an, a)ll', w(s e)/oike, peri\ pa/nta ta\ lego/mena mi/a tis te/xnh, ei)/per e)/stin, au(/th a)\n ei)/h, h(=| tis oi(=o/s t' e)/stai pa=n panti\ o(moiou=n tw=n dunatw=n kai\ oi(=s dunato/n, kai\ a)/llou o(moiou=ntos kai\ a)pokruptome/nou ei)s fw=s a)/gein.

sp.speaker: *fai=dros
sp.p: pw=s dh\ to\ toiou=ton le/geis;

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p: th=|de dokw= zhtou=sin fanei=sqai. a)pa/th po/teron e)n polu\ diafe/rousi gi/gnetai ma=llon h)\ o)li/gon;

sp.speaker: *fai=dros
sp.p: e)n toi=s o)li/gon.

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p: a)lla/ ge dh\ kata\ smikro\n metabai/nwn ma=llon lh/seis e)lqw\n e)pi\ to\ e)nanti/on h)\ kata\ me/ga.

sp.speaker: *fai=dros
sp.p: pw=s d' ou)/;

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p:
dei= a)/ra to
 me/llonta a)path/sein me
 a)/llon, au)to
 de\ mh\ a)path/sesqai, th
 o(moio/thta tw=n o)/ntwn kai\ a)nomoio/thta a)kribw=s dieide/nai.

sp.speaker: *fai=dros
sp.p: a)na/gkh me\n ou)=n.

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p: h)= ou)=n oi(=o/s te e)/stai, a)lh/qeian a)gnow=n e(ka/stou, th\n tou= a)gnooume/nou o(moio/thta smikra/n te kai\ mega/lhn e)n toi=s a)/llois diagignw/skein;

sp.speaker: *fai=dros
sp.p: a)du/naton.

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p: ou)kou=n toi=s para\ ta\ o)/nta doca/zousi kai\ a)patwme/nois dh=lon w(s to\ pa/qos tou=to di' o(moioth/twn tinw=n ei)serru/h.

sp.speaker: *fai=dros
sp.p: gi/gnetai gou=n ou(/tws.

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p: e)/stin ou)=n o(/pws texniko\s e)/stai metabiba/zein kata\ smikro\n dia\ tw=n o(moioth/twn a)po\ tou= o)/ntos e(ka/stote e)pi\ tou)nanti/on a)pa/gwn, h)\ au)to\s tou=to diafeu/gein, o( mh\ e)gnwrikw\s o(\ e)/stin e(/kaston tw=n o)/ntwn;

sp.speaker: *fai=dros
sp.p: ou) mh/ pote.

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p: lo/gwn a)/ra te/xnhn, w)= e(tai=re, o( th\n a)lh/qeian mh\ ei)dw/s, do/cas de\ teqhreukw/s, geloi/an tina/, w(s e)/oike, kai\ a)/texnon pare/cetai.

sp.speaker: *fai=dros
sp.p: kinduneu/ei.

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p: bou/lei ou)=n e)n tw=| *lusi/ou lo/gw| o(\n fe/reis, kai\ e)n oi(=s h(mei=s ei)/pomen i)dei=n ti w(=n famen a)te/xnwn te kai\ e)nte/xnwn ei)=nai;

sp.speaker: *fai=dros
sp.p: pa/ntwn ge/ pou ma/lista, w(s nu=n ge yilw=s pws le/gomen, ou)k e)/xontes i(kana\ paradei/gmata.

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p:
kai\ mh
 kata\ tu/xhn ge/ tina, w(s e)/oiken, e)rrhqh/thn tw\ lo/gw e)/xonte/ ti para/deigma, w(s a)
 o( ei)dw\s to\ a)lhqe\s prospai/zwn e)n lo/gois para/goi tou\s a)kou/ontas. kai\ e)/gwge, w)= *fai=dre, ai)tiw=mai tou\s e)ntopi/ous qeou/s: i)/sws de\ kai\ oi( tw=n *mousw=n profh=tai oi( u(pe kefalh=s w)|doi\ e)pipepneuko/tes a)
 h(mi=n ei)=en tou=to to\ ge/ras: ou) ga/r pou e)/gwge te/xnhs tino\s tou= le/gein me/toxos.

sp.speaker: *fai=dros
sp.p: e)/stw w(s le/geis: mo/non dh/lwson o(\ fh/|s.

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p: i)/qi dh/ moi a)na/gnwqi th\n tou= *lusi/ou lo/gou a)rxh/n.

sp.speaker: *fai=dros
sp.p:
“peri\ me
 tw=n e)mw=n pragma/twn e)pi/stasai, kai\ w(s nomi/zw sumfe/rein h(mi=n tou/twn genome/nwn, a)kh/koas. a)ciw= de\ mh\ dia\ tou=to a)tuxh=sai w(=n de/omai, o(/ti ou)k e)rasth\s w)
 sou= tugxa/nw. w(s e)kei/nois me
 to/te metame/lei” —

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p: pau=sai. ti/ dh\ ou)=n ou(=tos a(marta/nei kai\ a)/texnon poiei= lekte/on: h)= ga/r;

sp.speaker: *fai=dros
sp.p: nai/.

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p: a)=r' ou)=n ou) panti\ dh=lon to/ ge toio/nde, w(s peri\ me\n e)/nia tw=n toiou/twn o(monohtikw=s e)/xomen, peri\ d' e)/nia stasiwtikw=s;

sp.speaker: *fai=dros
sp.p: dokw= me\n o(\ le/geis manqa/nein, e)/ti d' ei)pe\ safe/steron.

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p: o(/tan tis o)/noma ei)/ph| sidh/rou h)\ a)rgu/rou, a)=r' ou) to\ au)to\ pa/ntes dienoh/qhmen;

sp.speaker: *fai=dros
sp.p: kai\ ma/la.

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p: ti/ d' o(/tan dikai/ou h)\ a)gaqou=; ou)k a)/llos a)/llh| fe/retai, kai\ a)mfisbhtou=men a)llh/lois te kai\ h(mi=n au)toi=s;

sp.speaker: *fai=dros
sp.p: pa/nu me\n ou)=n.

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p: e)n me\n a)/ra toi=s sumfwnou=men, e)n de\ toi=s ou)/.

sp.speaker: *fai=dros
sp.p: ou(/tw.

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p: pote/rwqi ou)=n eu)apathto/teroi/ e)smen, kai\ h( r(htorikh\ e)n pote/rois mei=zon du/natai;

sp.speaker: *fai=dros
sp.p: dh=lon o(/ti e)n oi(=s planw/meqa.

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p:
ou)kou=n to
 me/llonta te/xnhn r(htorikh
 metie/nai prw=ton me
 dei= tau=ta o(dw=| dih|rh=sqai, kai\ ei)lhfe/nai tina\ xarakth=ra e(kate/rou tou= ei)/dous, e)n w(=| te a)na/gkh to\ plh=qos plana=sqai kai\ e)n w(=| mh/.

sp.speaker: *fai=dros
sp.p: kalo\n gou=n a)/n, w)= *sw/krates, ei)=dos ei)/h katanenohkw\s o( tou=to labw/n.

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p: e)/peita/ ge oi)=mai pro\s e(ka/stw| gigno/menon mh\ lanqa/nein a)ll' o)ce/ws ai)sqa/nesqai peri\ ou(= a)\n me/llh| e)rei=n pote/rou o)\n tugxa/nei tou= ge/nous.

sp.speaker: *fai=dros
sp.p: ti/ mh/n;

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p: ti/ ou)=n; to\n e)/rwta po/teron fw=men ei)=nai tw=n a)mfisbhthsi/mwn h)\ tw=n mh/;

sp.speaker: *fai=dros
sp.p: tw=n a)mfisbhthsi/mwn dh/pou: h)\ oi)/ei a)/n soi e)gxwrh=sai ei)pei=n a(\ nundh\ ei)=pes peri\ au)tou=, w(s bla/bh te/ e)sti tw=| e)rwme/nw| kai\ e)rw=nti, kai\ au)=qis w(s me/giston <o)\n> tw=n a)gaqw=n tugxa/nei;

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p: a)/rista le/geis: a)ll' ei)pe\ kai\ to/de—e)gw\ ga/r toi dia\ to\ e)nqousiastiko\n ou) pa/nu me/mnhmai—ei) w(risa/mhn e)/rwta a)rxo/menos tou= lo/gou.

sp.speaker: *fai=dros
sp.p: nh\ *di/a a)mhxa/nws ge w(s sfo/dra.

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p:
feu=, o(/sw| le/geis texnikwte/ras *nu/mfas ta\s *)axelw/|ou kai\ *pa=na to
 *(ermou= *lusi/ou tou= *kefa/lou pro\s lo/gous ei)=nai. h)\ ou)de
 le/gw, a)lla\ kai\ o( *lusi/as a)rxo/menos tou= e)rwtikou= h)na/gkasen h(ma=s u(polabei=n to
 e)/rwta e(/n ti tw=n o)/ntwn o(\ au)to\s e)boulh/qh, kai\ pro\s tou=to h)/dh suntaca/menos pa/nta to
 u(/steron lo/gon diepera/nato; bou/lei pa/lin a)nagnw=men th
 a)rxh
 au)tou=;

sp.speaker: *fai=dros
sp.p: ei) soi/ ge dokei=: o(\ me/ntoi zhtei=s ou)k e)/st' au)to/qi.

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p: le/ge, i(/na a)kou/sw au)tou= e)kei/nou.

sp.speaker: *fai=dros
sp.p:
“peri\ me
 tw=n e)mw=n pragma/twn e)pi/stasai, kai\ w(s nomi/zw sumfe/rein h(mi=n tou/twn genome/nwn, a)kh/koas. a)ciw= de\ mh\ dia\ tou=to a)tuxh=sai w(=n de/omai, o(/ti ou)k e)rasth\s w)
 sou= tugxa/nw. w(s e)kei/nois me
 to/te metame/lei w(=n a)
 eu)= poih/swsin, e)peida
 th=s e)piqumi/as pau/swntai:” —

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p:
h)= pollou= dei=n e)/oike poiei=n o(/de ge o(\ zhtou=men, o(\s ou)de\ a)p' a)rxh=s a)ll' a)po\ teleuth=s e)c u(pti/as a)na/palin dianei=n e)pixeirei= to
 lo/gon, kai\ a)/rxetai a)f' w(=n pepaume/nos a)
 h)/dh o( e)rasth\s le/goi pro\s ta\ paidika/. h)\ ou)de
 ei)=pon, *fai=dre, fi/lh kefalh/;

sp.speaker: *fai=dros
sp.p: e)/stin ge/ toi dh/, w)= *sw/krates, teleuth/, peri\ ou(= to\n lo/gon poiei=tai.

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p:
ti/ de\ ta)=lla; ou) xu/dhn dokei= beblh=sqai ta\ tou= lo/gou; h)\ fai/netai to\ deu/teron ei)rhme/non e)/k tinos a)na/gkhs deu/teron dei=n teqh=nai, h)/ ti a)/llo tw=n r(hqe/ntwn; e)moi\ me
 ga e)/docen, w(s mhde
 ei)do/ti, ou)k a)gennw=s to\ e)pio
 ei)rh=sqai tw=| gra/fonti: su\ d' e)/xeis tina\ a)na/gkhn logografikh
 h(=| tau=ta e)kei=nos ou(/tws e)fech=s par' a)/llhla e)/qhken;

sp.speaker: *fai=dros
sp.p: xrhsto\s ei)=, o(/ti me h(gh=| i(kano\n ei)=nai ta\ e)kei/nou ou(/tws a)kribw=s diidei=n.

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p: a)lla\ to/de ge oi)=mai/ se fa/nai a)/n, dei=n pa/nta lo/gon w(/sper zw=|on sunesta/nai sw=ma/ ti e)/xonta au)to\n au(tou=, w(/ste mh/te a)ke/falon ei)=nai mh/te a)/poun, a)lla\ me/sa te e)/xein kai\ a)/kra, pre/ponta a)llh/lois kai\ tw=| o(/lw| gegramme/na.

sp.speaker: *fai=dros
sp.p: pw=s ga\r ou)/;

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p: ske/yai toi/nun to\n tou= e(tai/rou sou lo/gon ei)/te ou(/tws ei)/te a)/llws e)/xei, kai\ eu(rh/seis tou= e)pigra/mmatos ou)de\n diafe/ronta, o(\ *mi/da| tw=| *frugi/ fasi/n tines e)pigegra/fqai.

sp.speaker: *fai=dros
sp.p: poi=on tou=to, kai\ ti/ peponqo/s;

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p:
e)/sti me\n tou=to to/de—
xalkh= parqe/nos ei)mi/, *mi/da d' e)pi\ sh/mati kei=mai.
o)/fr' a)\n u(/dwr te na/h| kai\ de/ndrea makra\ teqh/lh|,
au)tou= th=|de me/nousa poluklau/tou e)pi\ tu/mbou,
a)ggele/w pariou=si *mi/das o(/ti th=|de te/qaptai.Midas o(/ti d' ou)de\n diafe/rei au)tou= prw=ton h)\ u(/stato/n ti le/gesqai, e)nnoei=s pou, w(s e)gw)=|mai.

sp.speaker: *fai=dros
sp.p: skw/pteis to\n lo/gon h(mw=n, w)= *sw/krates.

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p: tou=ton me\n toi/nun, i(/na mh\ su\ a)/xqh|, e)a/swmen— kai/toi suxna/ ge e)/xein moi dokei= paradei/gmata pro\s a(/ tis ble/pwn o)ni/nait' a)/n, mimei=sqai au)ta\ e)pixeirw=n mh\ pa/nu ti— ei)s de\ tou\s e(te/rous lo/gous i)/wmen. h)=n ga/r ti e)n au)toi=s, w(s dokw=, prosh=kon i)dei=n toi=s boulome/nois peri\ lo/gwn skopei=n.

sp.speaker: *fai=dros

sp.p: o(\s met' e)pisth/mhs gra/fetai e)n th=| tou= manqa/nontos yuxh=|, dunato\s me\n a)mu=nai e(autw=|, e)pisth/mwn de\ le/gein te kai\ siga=n pro\s ou(\s dei=.

sp.speaker: *fai=dros
sp.p: to\n tou= ei)do/tos lo/gon le/geis zw=nta kai\ e)/myuxon, ou(= o( gegramme/nos ei)/dwlon a)/n ti le/goito dikai/ws.

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p:
panta/pasi me
 ou)=n. to/de dh/ moi ei)pe/: o( nou=n e)/xwn gewrgo/s, w(=n sperma/twn kh/doito kai\ e)/gkarpa bou/loito gene/sqai, po/tera spoudh=| a)
 qe/rous ei)s *)adw/nidos kh/pous a)rw=n xai/roi qewrw=n kalou\s e)n h(me/raisin o)ktw\ gignome/nous, h)\ tau=ta me
 dh\ paidia=s te kai\ e(orth=s xa/rin drw/|h a)/n, o(/te kai\ poioi=: e)f' oi(=s de\ e)spou/daken, th=| gewrgikh=| xrw/menos a)
 te/xnh|, spei/ras ei)s to\ prosh=kon, a)gapw/|h a)
 e)n o)gdo/w| mhni\ o(/sa e)/speiren te/los labo/nta;

sp.speaker: *fai=dros
sp.p: ou(/tw pou, w)= *sw/krates, ta\ me\n spoudh=|, ta\ de\ w(s e(te/rws a)\n h(=| le/geis poioi=.

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p: to\n de\ dikai/wn te kai\ kalw=n kai\ a)gaqw=n e)pisth/mas e)/xonta tou= gewrgou= fw=men h(=tton nou=n e)/xein ei)s ta\ e(autou= spe/rmata;

sp.speaker: *fai=dros
sp.p: h(/kista/ ge.

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p: ou)k a)/ra spoudh=| au)ta\ e)n u(/dati gra/yei me/lani spei/rwn dia\ kala/mou meta\ lo/gwn a)duna/twn me\n au(toi=s lo/gw| bohqei=n, a)duna/twn de\ i(kanw=s ta)lhqh= dida/cai.

sp.speaker: *fai=dros
sp.p: ou)/koun dh\ to/ g' ei)ko/s.

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p:
ou) ga/r: a)lla\ tou\s me
 e)n gra/mmasi kh/pous, w(s e)/oike, paidia=s xa/rin sperei= te kai\ gra/yei, o(/tan [de\] gra/fh|, e(autw=| te u(pomnh/mata qhsaurizo/menos, ei)s to\ lh/qhs gh=ras e)a
 i(/khtai, kai\ panti\ tw=| tau)to
 i)/xnos metio/nti, h(sqh/setai/ te au)tou\s qewrw=n fuome/nous a(palou/s: o(/tan <de\> a)/lloi paidiai=s a)/llais xrw=ntai, sumposi/ois te a)/rdontes au(tou\s e(te/rois te o(/sa tou/twn a)delfa/, to/t' e)kei=nos, w(s e)/oiken, a)nti\ tou/twn oi(=s le/gw pai/zwn dia/cei.

sp.speaker: *fai=dros
sp.p: pagka/lhn le/geis para\ fau/lhn paidia/n, w)= *sw/krates, tou= e)n lo/gois duname/nou pai/zein, dikaiosu/nhs te kai\ a)/llwn w(=n le/geis pe/ri muqologou=nta.

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p:
e)/sti ga/r, w)= fi/le *fai=dre, ou(/tw: polu\ d' oi)=mai kalli/wn spoudh\ peri\ au)ta\ gi/gnetai, o(/tan tis th=| dialektikh=| te/xnh| xrw/menos, labw
 yuxh
 prosh/kousan, futeu/h| te kai\ spei/rh| met' e)pisth/mhs lo/gous, oi(\ e(autoi=s tw=| te futeu/santi bohqei=n i(kanoi\ kai\ ou)xi\ a)/karpoi a)lla\ e)/xontes spe/rma, o(/qen a)/lloi e)n a)/llois h)/qesi fuo/menoi tou=t' a)ei\ a)qa/naton pare/xein i(kanoi/, kai\ to
 e)/xonta eu)daimonei=n poiou=ntes ei)s o(/son a)nqrw/pw| dunato
 ma/lista.

sp.speaker: *fai=dros
sp.p: polu\ ga\r tou=t' e)/ti ka/llion le/geis.

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p: nu=n dh\ e)kei=na h)/dh, w)= *fai=dre, duna/meqa kri/nein, tou/twn w(mologhme/nwn.

sp.speaker: *fai=dros
sp.p: ta\ poi=a;

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p: w(=n dh\ pe/ri boulhqe/ntes i)dei=n a)fiko/meqa ei)s to/de, o(/pws to\ *lusi/ou te o)/neidos e)ceta/saimen th=s tw=n lo/gwn grafh=s pe/ri, kai\ au)tou\s tou\s lo/gous oi(\ te/xnh| kai\ a)/neu te/xnhs gra/fointo. to\ me\n ou)=n e)/ntexnon kai\ mh\ dokei= moi dedhlw=sqai metri/ws.

sp.speaker: *fai=dros
sp.p: e)/doce/ ge dh/: pa/lin de\ u(po/mnhso/n me pw=s.

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p:
pri
 a)/n tis to/ te a)lhqe\s e(ka/stwn ei)dh=| pe/ri w(=n le/gei h)\ gra/fei, kat' au)to/ te pa=n o(ri/zesqai dunato\s ge/nhtai, o(risa/meno/s te pa/lin kat' ei)/dh me/xri tou= a)tmh/tou te/mnein e)pisthqh=|, peri/ te yuxh=s fu/sews diidw
 kata\ tau)ta/, to\ prosarmo/tton e(ka/sth| fu/sei ei)=dos a)neuri/skwn, ou(/tw tiqh=| kai\ diakosmh=| to
 lo/gon, poiki/lh| me
 poiki/lous yuxh=| kai\ panarmoni/ous didou\s lo/gous, a(plou=s de\ a(plh=|, ou) pro/teron dunato
 te/xnh| e)/sesqai kaq' o(/son pe/fuke metaxeirisqh=nai to\ lo/gwn ge/nos, ou)/te ti pro\s to\ dida/cai ou)/te ti pro\s to\ pei=sai, w(s o( e)/mprosqen pa=s memh/nuken h(mi=n lo/gos.

sp.speaker: *fai=dros
sp.p: panta/pasi me\n ou)=n tou=to/ ge ou(/tw pws e)fa/nh.

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p:
ti/ d' au)= peri\ tou= kalo
 h)\ ai)sxro
 ei)=nai to\ lo/gous le/gein te kai\ gra/fein, kai\ o(/ph| gigno/menon e)n di/kh| le/goit' a)
 o)/neidos h)\ mh/, a)=ra ou) dedh/lwken ta\ lexqe/nta o)li/gon e)/mprosqen—

sp.speaker: *fai=dros
sp.p: ta\ poi=a;

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p:
w(s ei)/te *lusi/as h)/ tis a)/llos pw/pote e)/grayen h)\ gra/yei i)di/a| h)\ dhmosi/a| no/mous tiqei/s, su/ggramma politiko
 gra/fwn kai\ mega/lhn tina\ e)n au)tw=| bebaio/thta h(gou/menos kai\ safh/neian, ou(/tw me
 o)/neidos tw=| gra/fonti, ei)/te ti/s fhsin ei)/te mh/: to\ ga a)gnoei=n u(/par te kai\ o)/nar dikai/wn kai\ a)di/kwn pe/ri kai\ kakw=n kai\ a)gaqw=n ou)k e)kfeu/gei th=| a)lhqei/a| mh\ ou)k e)ponei/diston ei)=nai, ou)de\ a)
 o( pa=s o)/xlos au)to\ e)paine/sh|.

sp.speaker: *fai=dros
sp.p: ou) ga\r ou)=n.

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p:
o( de/ ge e)n me
 tw=| gegramme/nw| lo/gw| peri\ e(ka/stou paidia/n te h(gou/menos pollh
 a)nagkai=on ei)=nai, kai\ ou)de/na pw/pote lo/gon e)n me/trw| ou)d' a)/neu me/trou mega/lhs a)/cion spoudh=s grafh=nai, ou)de\ lexqh=nai w(s oi( r(ayw|dou/menoi a)/neu a)nakri/sews kai\ didaxh=s peiqou=s e(/neka e)le/xqhsan, a)lla\ tw=| o)/nti au)tw=n tou\s belti/stous ei)do/twn u(po/mnhsin gegone/nai, e)n de\ toi=s didaskome/nois kai\ maqh/sews xa/rin legome/nois kai\ tw=| o)/nti grafome/nois e)n yuxh=| peri\ dikai/wn te kai\ kalw=n kai\ a)gaqw=n [e)n] mo/nois h(gou/menos to/ te e)narge\s ei)=nai kai\ te/leon kai\ a)/cion spoudh=s: dei=n de\ tou\s toiou/tous lo/gous au(tou= le/gesqai oi(=on u(ei=s gnhsi/ous ei)=nai, prw=ton me
 to
 e)n au(tw=|, e)a
 eu(reqei\s e)nh=|, e)/peita ei)/ tines tou/tou e)/kgonoi/ te kai\ a)delfoi\ a(/ma e)n a)/llaisin a)/llwn yuxai=s kat' a)ci/an e)ne/fusan: tou\s de\ a)/llous xai/rein e)w=n—ou(=tos de\ o( toiou=tos a)nh kinduneu/ei, w)= *fai=dre, ei)=nai oi(=on e)gw/ te kai\ su\ eu)cai/meq' a)
 se/ te kai\ e)me\ gene/sqai.

sp.speaker: *fai=dros
sp.p: panta/pasi me\n ou)=n e)/gwge bou/lomai/ te kai\ eu)/xomai a(\ le/geis.

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p:
ou)kou=n h)/dh pepai/sqw metri/ws h(mi=n ta\ peri\ lo/gwn: kai\ su/ te e)lqw
 fra/ze *lusi/a| o(/ti nw\ kataba/nte e)s to\ *numfw=n na=ma/ te kai\ mousei=on h)kou/samen lo/gwn, oi(\ e)pe/stellon le/gein *lusi/a| te kai\ ei)/ tis a)/llos sunti/qhsi lo/gous, kai\ *(omh/rw| kai\ ei)/ tis a)/llos au)= poi/hsin yilh
 h)\ e)n w)|dh=| sunte/qhke, tri/ton de\ *so/lwni kai\ o(/stis e)n politikoi=s lo/gois no/mous o)noma/zwn suggra/mmata e)/grayen: ei) me
 ei)dw\s h(=| to\ a)lhqe\s e)/xei sune/qhke tau=ta, kai\ e)/xwn bohqei=n, ei)s e)/legxon i)w
 peri\ w(=n e)/graye, kai\ le/gwn au)to\s dunato\s ta\ gegramme/na fau=la a)podei=cai, ou)/ ti tw=nde e)pwnumi/an e)/xonta dei= le/gesqai to
 toiou=ton, a)ll' e)f' oi(=s e)spou/daken e)kei/nwn.

sp.speaker: *fai=dros
sp.p: ti/nas ou)=n ta\s e)pwnumi/as au)tw=| ne/meis;

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p: to\ me\n sofo/n, w)= *fai=dre, kalei=n e)/moige me/ga ei)=nai dokei= kai\ qew=| mo/nw| pre/pein: to\ de\ h)\ filo/sofon h)\ toiou=to/n ti ma=llo/n te a)\n au)tw=| kai\ a(rmo/ttoi kai\ e)mmeleste/rws e)/xoi.

sp.speaker: *fai=dros
sp.p: kai\ ou)de/n ge a)po\ tro/pou.

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p: ou)kou=n au)= to\n mh\ e)/xonta timiw/tera w(=n sune/qhken h)\ e)/grayen a)/nw ka/tw stre/fwn e)n xro/nw|, pro\s a)/llhla kollw=n te kai\ a)fairw=n, e)n di/kh| pou poihth\n h)\ lo/gwn suggrafe/a h)\ nomogra/fon proserei=s;

sp.speaker: *fai=dros
sp.p: ti/ mh/n;

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p: tau=ta toi/nun tw=| e(tai/rw| fra/ze.

sp.speaker: *fai=dros
sp.p: ti/ de\ su/; pw=s poih/seis; ou)de\ ga\r ou)de\ to\n so\n e(tai=ron dei= parelqei=n.

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p: ti/na tou=ton;

sp.speaker: *fai=dros
sp.p: *)isokra/th to\n kalo/n: w(=| ti/ a)paggelei=s, w)= *sw/krates; ti/na au)to\n fh/somen ei)=nai;

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p: ne/os e)/ti, w)= *fai=dre, *)isokra/ths: o(\ me/ntoi manteu/omai kat' au)tou=, le/gein e)qe/lw.

sp.speaker: *fai=dros
sp.p: to\ poi=on dh/;

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p:
dokei= moi a)mei/nwn h)\ kata\ tou\s peri\ *lusi/an ei)=nai lo/gous ta\ th=s fu/sews, e)/ti te h)/qei gennikwte/rw| kekra=sqai: w(/ste ou)de
 a)
 ge/noito qaumasto
 proi+ou/shs th=s h(liki/as ei) peri\ au)tou/s te tou\s lo/gous, oi(=s nu=n e)pixeirei=, ple/on h)\ pai/dwn diene/gkoi tw=n pw/pote a(yame/nwn lo/gwn, e)/ti te ei) au)tw=| mh\ a)poxrh/sai tau=ta, e)pi\ mei/zw de/ tis au)to
 a)/goi o(rmh\ qeiote/ra: fu/sei ga/r, w)= fi/le, e)/nesti/ tis filosofi/a th=| tou= a)ndro\s dianoi/a|. tau=ta dh\ ou)=n e)gw\ me
 para\ tw=nde tw=n qew=n w(s e)moi=s paidikoi=s *)isokra/tei e)cagge/llw, su\ d' e)kei=na w(s soi=s *lusi/a|.

sp.speaker: *fai=dros
sp.p: tau=t' e)/stai: a)lla\ i)/wmen, e)peidh\ kai\ to\ pni=gos h)piw/teron ge/gonen.

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p: ou)kou=n eu)came/nw| pre/pei toi=sde poreu/esqai;

sp.speaker: *fai=dros
sp.p: ti/ mh/n;

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p: w)= fi/le *pa/n te kai\ a)/lloi o(/soi th=|de qeoi/, doi/hte/ moi kalw=| gene/sqai ta)/ndoqen: e)/cwqen de\ o(/sa e)/xw, toi=s e)nto\s ei)=nai/ moi fi/lia. plou/sion de\ nomi/zoimi to\n sofo/n: to\ de\ xrusou= plh=qos ei)/h moi o(/son mh/te fe/rein mh/te a)/gein du/naito a)/llos h)\ o( sw/frwn.e)/t' a)/llou tou deo/meqa, w)= *fai=dre; e)moi\ me\n ga\r metri/ws hu)=ktai.

sp.speaker: *fai=dros
sp.p: kai\ e)moi\ tau=ta suneu/xou: koina\ ga\r ta\ tw=n fi/lwn.
